Package view

Interface IStockMarketView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockMarketViewImpl, WelcomeFrame
    public interface IStockMarketView
    The interface Stock market view which has methods like enterCommand which is used to read an input from the user and result which is used to append the result.
